alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 4:28AM CDT until May 17 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... North central Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 428 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Blackburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Skiatook... Hominy... Fairfax... Barnsdall... Shidler... Wynona... Ralston... Avant... Burbank... Blackburn... Skedee... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Webb City... Tallant... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
